Class ReportService

java.lang.Object
com.SC2002.bto.service.impl.ReportService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IReportService
public class ReportService extends Object implements IReportService
Implementation of the report service. Follows the Dependency Inversion Principle by depending on repository interfaces.
